testcase.classname: End To End flow to check the unit and total price of an item
testcase.name: Check the Unit Price and Total price of an item
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Home Page..................................................passed When User search for "Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch"............................passed And User add the Item to the cart and enter qty "5".........................passed When User view the shopping cart............................................passed Then User should see unit price "$1,800.00" and total price of item "Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch".passed
